org.commonreality.time.impl

Class OwnedClock

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.commonreality.time.impl.BasicClock
      • org.commonreality.time.impl.OwnedClock
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IClock

    public class OwnedClock
extends BasicClock
    a clock that can have one or more owners, as determined by an owner object (usually a thread). An authority is always generated. If no owners are set, anyone can update the time.
    Author:
    harrison
